name: TextReminders
0:
”Alexa, start text reminders”
”Alexa, open text reminders and add 3234567890 under MOM”
”Alexa, launch text reminders”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: text reminders
des:
Set it and forget it Text Reminders from Alexa that get delivered on time, every time!

Get scheduled (or delayed/timed) text reminders from Alexa (+1-206-316-8452). You'll always be reminded on-time & never miss a reminder again, especially when you're away from her!

We all know the fun & excitement of getting that unexpected text, so you'll be sure to see your reminders.

In skill you can:

* Set reminders to triggered at a specific time, date, or duration.
* Add multiple phone numbers to your contacts and send them reminders too.
* Cancel the last reminder you set.

Skill has a free 7-day trial then requires a subscription to send text reminders.

Great alternative uses :)...

- Message your loved ones with reminders that you love them.
- Plan an appropriately timed text message that gets you out of that potentially awful blind date you're about to go on.
- Schedule an appropriately timed reminder to "remind" your parents that you're about to skydive, when you're already in mid-air.

Also checkout the "Call Reminders" Skill.

Standard messaging and data rates may apply through your carrier.

We encourage you to leave a review if you like this Skill and comment with your suggestions. Your reviews encourage us to improve this skill and to keep making more great skills!

For a full list of skills, search for "CMM TECH" in the Alexa smartphone app or Amazon.com.

Icons from flaticon.com by Smashicons and srip.
